trends: There has been one other sighting in Camdenton
There were no other sightings in Camdenton on or around July 4th 2008
Summary: 3 bright white lights hovering in triangular formation
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile firing fireworks from our dock i turned to see 3 bright lights hovering just above the tree line ,almost seeming to be monitoring us .I yelled oh my god and the 5 other people with me turned and saw the craft ,it hovered for about 5 minutes moving slightly at times 3 lights were visible at other times only 2 lights were visible.The object then turned SW and began to slowly fly away at this point 3 lights were distinctly visible, making no noise then suddenly accelerated out of sight.The others were scared but i remember wanting to get closer and wanting to chase it but it headed Sw through thick woods and made chase impossible.My family and friends were extremely shook up after the event and all but my friend and i went into the house ,we remained another hour hoping to see it again but did not .
